item.title: Welcome to the Monospace Web
item.description:
Welcome to the Minimalist Web Hugo theme! This theme embraces a monospace-first design philosophy inspired by The Monospace Web.

What is Monospace-First Design?

Instead of using proportional fonts for body text and reserving monospace fonts for code, this theme uses monospace fonts throughout the entire interface.

Benefits

  • Visual consistency: Single typeface family eliminates noise
  • Character-based grid: Layout aligns to character-sized increments
  • Terminal aesthetic: Evokes retro computing while remaining modern
  • Code-friendly: No jarring font switches between text and code

Typography Examples

Here’s how different elements look:
